instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Drunk MacBook Air A1466 2015 13" on red wine and crane berry juice mmm.....
threads.message:
Took it apart. Bad lcd connector, wine all over the periphery of the board. Soaked battery and keyboard..
Should I even quote the repair? Found two on eBay for around 690$. 
Technology is so low income.

threads.title: Drunk MacBook Air A1466 2015 13" on red wine and crane berry juice mmm.....
threads.message: Check the LCD first, many times the really bad liquid damage also have liquid inside the LCD, besides that it is up to you.

threads.title: Drunk MacBook Air A1466 2015 13" on red wine and crane berry juice mmm.....
threads.message: Thanks dukefawks, I just entered 820-00165-A on aliexpress and found the board with holes. I was typing a1466 2015 macbook air which only showed new boards.

threads.title: Drunk MacBook Air A1466 2015 13" on red wine and crane berry juice mmm.....
threads.message: Hi dukefawks, I am starting to buy the donor boards from aliexpress. I wanted to know what boards should I stock up on. For example, macbook pro retina models 2103-2015 and mac air 2012-2015...
